item.title: Loz, A Command-Line Interface Tool for ChatGPT
item.description: When I first encountered ChatGPT, I thought it would be a good idea to use it to write GIT messages. I often spend a lot of time writing and updating GIT messages to explain my changes in a better and more concise way, but it is not always easy. So, I implemented a small CLI tool called Loz to write GIT messages in a GIT repository. It worked well, and some people started using it and contributing to my project.
